channel.name: Titanium SIU
channel.description: Channel to processes SIU messages into Titanium appointments.

properties.query: MERGE APPT6 as [Target] USING (SELECT ${maps.get('Appointment ID')} as apptid, ${maps.get('Patient RecordNum')} as ptid, CAST(${maps.get('Appointment Date')} as Date) as date, + CAST (${maps.get('Appointment Time')} as Datetime) as time, ${maps.get('Doctor ID')} as dentist, ${maps.get('Appointment Length')} as ulength, '1' as wstatus, ${maps.get('Appointment UID')} as uidapptid, ${Room} as room, CAST(${maps.get('Current Date')} as Date) as CreatedDate, CAST(${maps.get('Current Time')} as Date) as CreatedTime, CAST(${maps.get('Current Date')} as Date) as UpdatedDate, CAST(${maps.get('Current Time')} as Date) as UpdatedTime ) as [Source] on [Target].ssExternalID = [Source].apptid when matched then update set [Target].ridPatient = [Source].ptid, [Target].dtDate = [Source].date, [Target].tmTime = [Source].time, [Target].dentist = [Source].dentist, [Target].ulength = [Source].ulength, [Target].wstatus = [Source].wstatus, [Target].room = [Source].room, [Target].UpdatedDate = [Source].UpdatedDate, [Target].UpdatedTime = [Source].UpdatedTime when not matched then insert (RecordNum,siteid, ssExternalID,ridPatient,dtDate,tmtime,dentist,ulength,wstatus,uidapptid,room,createddate,createdtime,updateddate,updatedtime) values (${maps.get('Appointment RecordNum')},${maps.get('Site ID')},[source].apptid, [source].ptid, [source].date, [source].time, [source].dentist ,[source].ulength,[source].wstatus,[source].uidapptid,[source].room,[Source].CreatedDate,[Source].CreatedTime,[source].updateddate,[source].updatedtime) ;

com.mirth.connect.plugins.javascriptstep.name: Get RecordNum from Patient ID
Get NextRecordNum from FileInfo
Check if ExternalID/Appointment ID exists
Get next Appointment UID
Get Site ID
Get room
Check if ExternalID/Appointment ID exists
Get the login cookie from HTTP response
Retry login if it failed

channel.preprocessingScript: // Modify the message variable below to pre process data return message;
